you can see these things.

2656.text: Well, if you really want a transfer...

2659.text:
...I`ll talk to Frederick when he gets
back from Russia.

2662.text: But I`ll be sorry to lose you.

2669.text: I`ll just go to the loo.

2680.text: It didn`t take you long to find one.

2682.text:
It didn`t take me long
What about you

2684.text:
Last night you were kissing and
cuddling him in the street.

2689.text:
You were - I went out to get a pizza and
when I was coming back, I saw you.

2694.text:
I wasn`t cuddling Gary. He had fallen
over and twisted his ankle.

2698.text:
I was helping him. Isn`t that right,
Gary

2706.text: I`m back. Are these your friends

2711.text:
This is, um, Gary, Sean,
Rebecca and Julia.

2722.text:
Your sister Your sister
Why didn`t you say

2726.text: You didn`t give me a chance.

2728.text: There`s a free table over there.

2730.text: So, what are you doing here
